activities: OHL serves as the supply chain manager for companies headquartered in the EU, supporting their operations via transportation management, contract logistics, freight management and customs brokerage.  OHL may receive personal data of its employees in the EU.  We receive customer data from our clients for shipping cargo, etc.
eucountries: Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, Staff, Client, Customer, includes manually processed data
recoursemech: OHL will satisfy the requirements through compliance with the private sector developed privacy program of the Council of Better Business Bureaus (CBBB). OHL has entered into a Participation Agreement with the CBBB and a Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution Procedure is in place (BBB EU Safe Harbor); EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR data only.
